entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Please wait while I connect you with an agent.
Finally! I've been on hold forever! I need to return something.
Thank you for calling VeloFit. My name is Alex, how can I help you today?
Yeah, hi Alex. I want to return a VeloBand Pulse I bought a little while ago. It's just not working out for me.
Okay, I understand. Can I get your order number or the email address associated with the purchase, please?
Sure, it's customer123@email.com
Thank you. Let me pull up your order. Okay, I see the VeloBand Pulse you purchased. And when was it delivered?
I think it was about two weeks ago, maybe a little less. What does it matter anyway? I don't like it.

The delivery date is important because of our return window. According to our records, the VeloBand Pulse was delivered on July 1st, and today is July 16th. Our return window is 10 days from the delivery date.
Ten days? Seriously? I didn't see anything about that! That's ridiculous! I want a refund! This thing is useless to me. I only wore it once! Are you telling me I'm stuck with this now?

I understand your frustration, and I apologize for any inconvenience. Unfortunately, the return window has passed. Our standard policy does state a 10-day return window from the date of delivery. However, let me see if there's anything I can do. One moment please.

(Slight pause) While I can't offer a full refund outside of the return window, I can offer you store credit for the amount of the VeloBand Pulse. This would allow you to purchase something else from our VeloFit store.
Store credit? Seriously? That's the best you can do? This is so unfair! I want my money back!
I understand, and I wish I could offer a full refund. Let me see if a policy exception can be made. I will need to speak with my supervisor. Please hold for a brief moment.

(Longer pause) Thank you for your patience. I've spoken with my supervisor, and unfortunately, we are unable to make a policy exception for a full refund at this time, given that it's been 15 days since delivery. However, I can still offer the store credit. I believe that's the best option to help you get value from VeloFit.
Ugh, fine. Store credit then. But this is the last time I buy anything from VeloFit.
I understand. To process the store credit, I'll need to confirm your shipping address. Is it still the same as the one on file?
Yes, it's the same.

Okay, great. I've processed the store credit. You should receive an email within the next 24 hours with a code that you can use on your next VeloFit purchase. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks, I guess.
You're welcome. Thank you for calling VeloFit. Have a great day!
